header.title: crypto

description.p:
The purpose of this application is to provide an Erlang API to cryptographic functions, see crypto(3). Notice that the API is on a fairly low level. Some corresponding API functions on a higher abstraction level are available in
public_key:public_key(3), which uses the Crypto application in its implementation.

section.title: Dependencies
section.p: The Crypto implementation uses NIFs to interface the OpenSSLs crypto library and requires OpenSSL package version 0.9.8 or higher.
Source releases of OpenSSL can be downloaded from the OpenSSL project home page or mirror sites listed there.
